name: SHISH KAPOW!
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2021 Submission with the theme "Joined Together"

Shoot toothpicks to skewer enemies to walls! The more enemies you kill in one shot, the higher score you get.

Controls:

WASD or Left Stick to Move.

Mouse or Right Stick to Aim.

R2/R1 or Left Mouse Click or ctrl to shoot.

L1/L2 or Space or Shift to Dodge.

P or Escape to pause.
